tcpw_truck.recommendation: Regenerate using real truck photography as base, or photobash real industrial truck images. Do not use as image-to-image input.

property_manager.recommendation: Regenerate with stronger entropy focus. Consider using real stock photography of a professional woman as base reference instead of pure AI generation.

softwash_flatbed.recommendation: Use real truck photography. AI cannot generate mechanically coherent vehicle equipment.

tcpw_trailer.recommendation: Use real trailer photography. The mechanical complexity exceeds current AI generation capabilities.

hero_tactical_gear.priority: HIGH — needed for Scene 3 Astrodome Reveal (key frame)
hero_tactical_gear.note: most important reference in the project

interceptor_motorcycle.priority: HIGH — needed for Scene 4 Tactical Pursuit

crew_members.priority: MEDIUM — needed for Scene 3 and Scene 6
